# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, with an estimated worth of $12000. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I am extending a special offer to you. If you decide to proceed, you can acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11000. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or finalizing the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
